item.title: Steps to create a personal site with hugo
item.description: A personal site could do much with your interview and make you more competitive! In this paper I would share with you detailed steps for how to create a new public site using hugo, which is one of latest tools for building a site. Getting started Prerequisite Tools check if your computer have installed those tools when you are encounter issues in the process. Git Go > 1.11 Step 1: Install Hugo Mac: If you are using mac, you can make use of brew package by typing the following command in terminal:
